data.title: Transdev United States
data.text:
Current employees can visit my.adp.com for a printable copy of their W2. Even if you are no longer employed by Transdev, you can still get your W2 on the portal as long as you have not been separated from the company for over three years. If you have any questions, please contact us.corporatehr@transdev.com.

1099 forms for existing contracted vendors will be sent via the U.S. mail by January 31, 2024.

If you have not received your form by mid-February, please email us.corporateap@transdev.com and include “Existing contracted vendor requesting 1099 Form” in the subject line.

For vendors currently operating under a contract with “First Transit,” inquiries can be made to us.ft.payables@transdev.com and include “Existing contracted vendor requesting 1099 Form” in the subject line.

Employees can check my.adp.com for a copy of their past paychecks.

Even if you are no longer employed by Transdev, you can still get your past paychecks on the portal as long as you have not been separated from the company for over three years.

If you are looking for a paycheck from prior to three years ago or need general income verification, please contact us.corporatehr@transdev.com

Transdev vendors and other invoice inquiries can be made to US.corporateap@transdev.com

For vendors currently operating under a contract with “First Transit,” all vendor and other invoice inquiries can be made to us.ft.payables@transdev.com

All invoices for “First Transit” & “First Vehicle Services” should be sent to the following Accounts Payable email address to ensure prompt payment: transdev@pdf.basware.com
